Entries.Resort_Entering: Aww, look at that cute crab!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Meh... I got sand in my shoe...$s#$b#But, I still had a really good time.$h
Entries.Resort_Shore: I'm collecting seashells for a necklace. Let me know if you find any good ones.$h
Entries.reject_869: Eugh! Gross, gross, gross! Give that to Vincent, not me!$s
Entries.Mon: Hmm...? Oh, are you looking for Aunt Marnie?$u
Entries.Mon4: It's nice living on a farm... I hope you enjoy yours, too!$h
Entries.Tue: *giggle* Sorry, I just remembered a really funny joke Haley told me.
Entries.Tue6: A doll? No, no, dolls are for babies. This is my Aurella Magi Meguka Magica figurine!
Entries.Wed: ...$u#$e#Sorry... sometimes I don't talk much. I get shy.$u
Entries.Wed4: Aunt Marnie won't let me go out after 6 o'clock. That's ridiculous, right?!$s#$e#I'm {{OmegaFallon.ThisTooShallPassCS/JasAge}}, I'm not a baby anymore!
Entries.Thu: I shouldn't talk to strangers... but Aunt Marnie and Shane know you, so I guess you're alright.$u
Entries.Thu2: Miss Penny is teaching me how to write in cursive.$h#$e#She has such pretty handwriting. I guess it makes sense, since she's a pretty lady.
Entries.Fri: ... I don't know you.$u#$e#Wait, do I know you? No, I've seen you around a lot, I have to know you, right?
Entries.Fri2: Do you like my bow? I think it makes me look really pretty.$h
Entries.Fri4: I like living on the farm... my favorite is the fresh ice cream from our cows' milk. You can come over and have some, if you want!
Entries.Sat: You smell like grass. Just like Vincent...$u
Entries.Sat8: You're really nice, @. You're like a cool uncle!^You're really nice, @. You're like a cool aunt!$h#$e#Most of the older people in this town are real buzzkills, but you're different.
Entries.Sun: Huh? Do you... need something?$u#$e#Sorry, I get nervous around strangers.$u
Entries.Sun2: Shane's gone a lot, and Aunt Marnie is busy all the time... but I almost always have Vincent.#$e#I'm thankful I have such a great friend.$h
Entries.Sun10: Did you know Shane's my godfather? He was a friend of my parents.$s#$e#...I'm... glad I know him.$s
Entries.rejectNPCB: So, you're some kind of criminal?$4
Entries.engageB: Aunt Marnie told me there are weird people like you out there.$4#$b#She told me I should scream out if you start to scare me.$4
Entries.marriedA: I'm {{OmegaFallon.ThisTooShallPassCS/JasAge}}, and you're married. What the heck is wrong with you?$a
Entries.marriedB: You think I won't call the police? I will.$3
Entries.birthdayLoveA: Ooh, I love this! Thanks so much!
Entries.birthdayLoveB: This is such an awesome birthday present. Thank you so much!$1
Entries.birthdayDislikeB: ...For my birthday? Thank you very much...$2

Entries.winter_18.000: I have to visit the doctor today... it's not fun, but I know it's important!
Entries.winter_15.001: I wish I was old enough to see the mermaid show...$s#$b#I ask every year, but nobody can tell me why! Am I not allowed to see pretty girls...?$s
Entries.summer.000: Sometimes Vincent likes to come out here and hunt for snails in the lake.#$b#He's kinda weird, isn't he?$h
Entries.winter_15.000: Hehe... my jacket's so warm and poofy, I don't even mind the cold!$h
Entries.spring.000: Someday I wanna go swimming in the ocean... but I think I could settle for that lake over there!$h

Jas.0: Oh my gosh, thank you so much! This is great!
Jas.2: Aww, thanks for the present! That's sweet.
Jas.4: Oh, as a gift? ...Thank you very much.

Entries.Jas: Vincent always gets more eggs than me... but this year I'm gonna beat him!$h
Entries.Jas_y2: This is gonna be the day that Abby's winning streak ends! I'll show her!$h

Entries.Jas: I can't wait until I'm older so I can be the flower queen!$h#$b#And Vincent can be...! Uhh, there! Also.$u
Vincent always gets bored when there's dancing at a festival. It's kind of funny how stupid he can be sometimes.$h#$e#C'mon, Vincy... I'm right here.$u

Changes.LogName: Jas 13 dialogue - Dance of the Moonlight Jellies

Entries.Jas: Ooh, Vincent, look! That one's got the same dorky red hair as you!$u
Agh! A hen bit my finger... Vincent, do you have a bandaid?$u
Hehe... Aunt Marnie said I could go in the maze if I take Vincent with me.$h#$b#I'll probably have to hold his hand the whole time.$u
Vincent wanted to make a cool buff snowman, but I wanted to make a cute snow princess. So we decided to make a cool buff cute snow princess!$h#$b#I'm... honestly surprised it worked out!$u

Changes.LogName: Jas 13 dialogue - Feast of the Winter Star

Entries.Jas: Teehee... I wonder what I got! Hopefully something pretty...$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh... Vincent is here? Umm... yeah, that's okay! Nervous? Who's nervous?$2

DuringMovie.Script: /message "(Jas is blushing and looking between the screen and the floor.)"
DuringMovie.Text: Mmm... that's really sweet! I wonder...

AfterMovie.Text: That was nice! Umm... do me a favor and forget this ever happened okay?$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh, hey, Vincent is here! Well, I'm sure I can brave it out, then!$h

DuringMovie.Script: /message "(Jas and Vincent exchange a glance and keep their cool!)"
DuringMovie.Text: There we go... be brave, Jas! Don't embarrass yourself...

AfterMovie.Text: That was... a lot more of a trial-by-fire than I was expecting, but hey, I won!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh, hey, Vincent is here! Well, I'm sure this'll be fun no matter what, then!$h
Ooh, I'm excited. This is gonna be fun!$h

AfterMovie.Text: That was really great! Thanks for bringing me!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Mmm... I'm not sure I'm allowed to see this... but I guess Aunt Marnie doesn't *have* to know.$u

DuringMovie.Script: /message "Jas is toughing it out, smirking to herself."
DuringMovie.Text: Deep breaths, Jas... you're a big girl!

AfterMovie.Text: Hehe... that wasn't so bad, actually!

BeforeMovie.Text: Ooh, this is one of those movies for adults, right? I'm sure I'll like it, I'm a big girl!

AfterMovie.Text: That was nice! I think I get why you all like that one.$h
